subject: Olympic Games (2010)
News and News Media
lead_paragraph: Al Michaels is back at the Olympics as NBC’s daytime host, 22 years after his last Games, in Calgary, and 30 years after he called the Miracle on Ice.
snippet: Al Michaels is back at the Olympics as NBC’s daytime host, 22 years after his last Games, in Calgary, and 30 years after he called the Miracle on Ice.
